ETYMOLOGY: From Russian политбюро (politbjuro), a blend of политическое (političeskoe, “political”) and бюро (bjuro, “bureau”).

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: The principal policy-making committee of a communist party.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 共产党内部主要的政策制定委员会。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The Politburo issued a directive outlining the country's new economic plan.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 政治局发布了一项指令，概述了该国新的经济计划。
